item.description:
Saddle Bag Boogie-weeklong vacation Aug 16-23



For those that enjoy being in the saddle for a week..........this year we will be travelling all over new England doing factory tours, riding great mountain roads and ending with a Hot air balloon festival.

See club website: www.newenglandthunder.com for all club info, membership info and photogallery

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Saddlebag Boogie
